short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play all songs from artist. You can play all popular songs from artists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension you can play all songs from artist's Songs page. You can play songs by popularity. =)
